content: उभय {%<ab>pron. a.</ab>%} (यी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) (Though dual in sense, it is used in the singular and plural only; according to some grammarians in the dual also) Both (of persons or things); उभयमप्यपरितोषं समर्थये <ls>Ś. 7</ls>; उभयमानशिरे वसुधाधिपाः <ls>R. 9. 9</ls>; उभयीं सिद्धिमुभाववापतुः <ls n="R.">8. 23</ls>, <ls n="R.">17. 38</ls>; <ls>Amaru. 60</ls>; <ls>Ku. 7. 78</ls>; <ls>Ms. 2. 55</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">4. 224</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">9. 34.</ls>
